title: Updated: Wout van Aert Out of Flanders, Roubaix with ‘Broken Collarbone and Several Ribs’
content:
Belgian star's classics dreams devastated again after crash brings down Pedersen, Stuyven, and huge bunch of favorites.

Read the full article at Updated: Wout van Aert Out of Flanders, Roubaix with ‘Broken Collarbone and Several Ribs’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
